modName: No Unthematic World Interactions after Civil War
summary: Disables unthematic random interactions after the Civil War is ended.
descriptionHtml:
EDIT: New version uploaded that fixes first five interactions still happening. Please report if you still see them! The new version checks whether stage 100 of CWFinale is finished (the event when you deal with Tullius/Ulfric when sieging their castles).

Disables some "unthematic" world interactions after the Civil War is finished.

The following random interactions are changed:

Looking to join Imperials
Looking to join Stormcloaks
Imperials vs. Stormcloaks
Imperials with Stormcloak Prisoner (since the prisoner tells you to join Ulfric and runs to Windhelm)
Thalmor with Prisoner (for the same reason, and since it's unlikely the Thalmor would be able to openly capture people like that in independent Skyrim)

Disabled after you complete the Civil War.


Imperial/Stormcloak Scout Patrol/On the Road

Fire only if Tullius/Ulfric respectively are alive (meaning, as long as their GetDeadCount is 0).


Forsworn attacking Imperial Soldiers
Bandits dressed as Imperial Soldiers (in independent Skyrim, being dressed as an Imperial Soldier shouldn't grant even the fleeting appearance of legitimacy)
Thalmor Travelling on the Road

Fire only if Tullius is alive.

My first TESedit tweak (calling it a mod would be overstating its scope), which I use in my own game. Likely unneeded/incompatible with major epic CW-changing mods like Civil War Overhaul. If you find any coding flaws, let me know.
author: LoneWolfEburg
